import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from "@angular/router"; import { AdminPanelComponent } from '../admin-panel/admin-panel.component'; @Component({ selector: 'edit-post', templateUrl: './edit-post.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-post.css'] }) export class EditPostComponent { public posts: Posts[] = [] public static Url: string = 'https://localhost:7080/Category/GetAllCategories'; public static UrlPost: string = 'https://localhost:7080/Post/GetById?id=5'; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private router: Router) { http.get(EditPostComponent.UrlPost).subscribe(response => { posts = response; }); } onClickSubmit() { console.log(this.posts[1].title); } } interface Posts{ id: number; title: string; description: string; date: string; categoryFK: number; category: any; }
